name: JustCubes
description:
v0.1

You're a cube. The developer of this game is lazy.  Dodge the red stuff, it's a fundamental concept in most games. In certain levels you become invisible, your speed increases, the fog around you increases and more. And yes. There's a Boss Fight. Don't ask me how that works, play the game (hehe). Also a mysterious dude helps you through out the game. By that I mean the developer shows text on your screen which will help you.

If you know Brackeys you probably are familiar with this.

This is my first game made in unity and I took his concept and expanded it.

It's not just a game where you are a cube and dodge stuff. Well... it is, but there's more to it. For example, there's a BOSS FIGHT (sadly you dont fight anyone but your progression in the Boss Fight level reduces his health).

20 levels, including 3 'training' levels (to prepare you for the boss fight) and the boss fight itself. It would take you 20-30 minutes to complete the game.

The game's pretty simple,  you only need two press two keys (A and D). If this does get popular I'd like to add more features such as a pause button,  a play button in the menu and fix bugs and issues in general.

Please do give your feedback!

You can download the game for free by skipping the donation part by clicking  'No thanks, just take me to the downloads'. However, donations are greatly appreciated!

Game trailer coming soon.
